H0.text: what college did albert einstein go to. University of Cambridge

H1.text: what college did albert einstein go to. University of Oxford

H2.text: what college did albert einstein go to. University of Berlin

H3.text: what college did albert einstein go to. ETH Zurich

A4.text: ETH Zurich has produced and attracted many famous scientists, including Albert Einstein and John von Neumann.

A5.text: More than twenty Nobel laureates have either studied at ETH Zurich or were awarded the Nobel Prize for their work achieved at ETH Zurich.
